name: Enlightenment Theme File
summary: Learn about .EDJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: EDJ files can be used for designing user interfaces, but they are most commonly used as theme files for E17, the Development Release 17 (DR17) of the Enlightenment Desktop Environment. EDJ themes are also used by Openmoko's Neo FreeRunner mobile phone platform.
NOTE: EDJ is short for "Edje," the graphical library that controls window decorations and desktop behaviors for Enlightenment.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
